title: Exponential Distribution
text: Using the decay parameter $$\frac{1}{12}$$, we know that the average elapsed time of a ohone call in munutes is 12 minutes on an exponential distribution.

title: We may use a PDF function and set the decay parameter to $$\frac{1}{12}$$ and use $$P\left(X>x\right)$$, where x is the probability cutoff.
Set x to 5 minutes since we want to find the area under the exponential distribution curve when X is greater than 5.
